dcterms:description: The FIGNEWS shared task addresses bias and propaganda annotation in multilingual news posts, focusing on the early days of the Israel War on Gaza. It aims to foster collaboration in developing annotation guidelines for subjective tasks by creating frameworks for analyzing diverse narratives highlighting potential bias and propaganda.
dcterms:title: FIGNEWS 2024

dcterms:creator: Timo Spinde
Jan-David Krieger
Manuel Plank
Bela Gipp
dcterms:description: The MBIC dataset includes detailed information about annotator characteristics and provides labels for bias identification at both the word and sentence levels, representing a significant step forward in creating reliable ground-truth data for bias detection.
dcterms:title: MBIC dataset

dcterms:creator: Timo Spinde
Kanishka Sinha
Norman Meuschke
Bela Gipp
dcterms:description: TASSY is a text annotation survey system that enhances the quality control of annotation processes in NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: TASSY

dcterms:creator: Nagham Hamad
Mustafa Jarrar
Mohammed Khalilia
Nadim Nashif
dcterms:description: The Offensive Hebrew Corpus is designed for detecting and classifying various forms of offensive language in Hebrew on social media.
dcterms:title: Offensive Hebrew Corpus

dcterms:creator: Mustafa Jarrar
Nagham Hamad
Mohammed Khalilia
Bashar Talafha
AbdelRahim Elmadany
Muhammad Abdul-Mageed
dcterms:description: WojoodGaza is a new NER dataset related to the Israeli War on Gaza, developed for the WojoodNER Shared Task.
dcterms:title: WojoodGaza

dcterms:creator: Marco Casavantes
Manuel Montes y Gómez
Luis Carlos González
Alberto Barrón-Cedeno
dcterms:description: Propitter is a Twitter corpus developed for computational propaganda detection.
dcterms:title: Propitter

dcterms:description: CrowdTangle is a platform used to collect Facebook posts related to the Israel War on Gaza in multiple languages.
dcterms:title: CrowdTangle
